Test Name: Cryptococcus Antigen Titer, Lateral Flow Assay (CSF)
Purpose: To detect and titer Cryptococcus antigen in cerebrospinal fluid to aid in the diagnosis of Cryptococcus neoformans infection.
Container: Not specified in SOP (use appropriate sterile CSF collection tube)
Equipment: Cryptococcus Antigen Lateral Flow Test Kit, micropipettes with tips, timer, test tubes/reaction vials
